name: n8n-nodes-base.aiTransform
semantic_context: Modify data based on instructions written in plain english

instructions.name: instructions
instructions.description: Provide instructions on how you want to transform the data, then click 'Generate code'. Use dot notation to refer to nested fields (e.g. address.street).
instructions.placeholder: Example: Merge 'firstname' and 'lastname' into a field 'details.name' and sort by 'email'
instructions.ai_hint: Provide instructions on how you want to transform the data, then click 'Generate code'. Use dot notation to refer to nested fields (e.g. address.street).

jsCode.name: jsCode
jsCode.hint: Read-only. To edit this code, adjust the instructions or copy and paste it into a Code node.
